title: News Pal
description: A group project where we created a news application that allows users to choose their preferences and have their own personalised news feed. My role was login and sign up functionality (user authentication), user profile and preferences and setting up firebase database to store user preferences.
tools: Firebase, React Router, React, CSS, Bootstrap

title: Hoobank Landing Page
description: This application is a modern UI/UX website. It's consists of a stunning hero section, high-quality assets, gradients, and more.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This application is a weather dashboard that allows users to check the current weather for an inputted city as well as a 5 day forecast.
tools: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, Moment.js, OpenWeather API

title: Rock Paper Scissors
description: This application is a rock paper scissors game where you play against the computer and the first to score 5 points wins.

title: Timed Code Quiz
description: This application is a timed coding quiz with multiple-choice questions on javascript.

title: Password Generator
description: This application creates a randomly generated password based on the criteria that a user provides when prompted and display the password on a webpage.
